articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il 
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket by the family of Zhang Weihua, Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, on Monday on the occasion of the 17th anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Revolutionary Life and Immortal Exploits Praised
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Revolutionary Life and Immortal Exploits Praised
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- The noble revolutionary life and immortal feats of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk were highly praised by foreigners who visited the DPRK.
					 D. Michka, general director of the Mongolian HUM Company Ltd., said that her company has held Kim Jong Suk in high esteem as its honorary member for more than a decade.
					
					 It instituted the "Prize of Kim Jong Suk, Heroine of the DPRK" to hand down through generations the exploits performed by the woman commander of Mt. Paektu, she noted, and went on:
					
					It is her greatest feat that she provided a sure guarantee for carrying forward generation after generation and accomplishing the revolutionary cause started by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The world progressives speak highly of Kim Jong Suk as a great mother of Korea, an ardent patriot and an outstanding revolutionary.
					
					Sysay Leudedmounsone, president of the Central Committee of the Lao Women's Union, said that Kim Jong Suk's revolutionary career is shining as an example in devotedly defending the leader.
					
					 Jose Renato Ravello, national chairman of the Brazilian Communist Party, said that Kim Jong Suk devoted her all to the country's liberation and people's happiness since she embarked upon the road of revolution at her early age.
					
					 Surina Acosta Brooks, general secretary of the Santiago de Cuba Provincial Committee of the Cuban Women's Federation, noted that the great revolutionary life of the woman commander of Mt. Paektu is shining as a star still today.
					
					 Liu Xiaolian, vice-president of the All-China Women's Federation, stressed that the revolutionary exploits preformed by Kim Jong Suk would be immortal.

articles.title: Many Books Off Press
articles.content:
Many Books Off Press
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- The Industrial Publishing House brought out at least 190,000 books of 70 odd kinds this year.
					 They deal with the immortal feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary
						Kim Jong Il for the prosperity of the country and their personality as peerlessly great men and the research achievements and technical data gained in the drive to carry out the task for putting the national economy on a Juche-oriented, modern and scientific basis.
					
					 Among them are "Complete Book of Kimilsungia" and book "Indelible Trace Left in Building an Economic Power" (Vol. 5), which tells about the great leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il who set forth the strategic line of socialist economic construction and laid solid foundation for building a great prosperous powerful nation through his energetic field guidance.
					
					 They also include books "Know-how of Industry for Quality Control", "Power Electronic Devices", "Modern Technique for Melting in Cupola", "Library of Microbial Industry" (Vols. 1 and 2), "Collection of Scientific and Technical Data for Afforestation and Gardening", "Guide to Insects Harmful to Forest", "Larch Seed Production and Planting" and "Technique for Sewage Biotic Disposal Process".
					
					 Besides, there are "Popular Meal and Cooking", "Health Food for Family" and other books of common knowledge which are helpful to further developing the Korean national dishes and improving the diet of the people.

articles.title: Showrooms Thick in National Odor
articles.content:
Showrooms Thick in National Odor
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- There are in Kwangbok and Yongung Streets of Pyongyang Tourism Souvenir Showrooms where one can see the creative wisdom and sentiments of the Korean nation.
					 Each of them consists of a souvenir shop and restaurant, which are congested with customers every day.
					
					 Available at the shop are famous Koryo celadon and other porcelains, folding screens, straw goods, various kinds of mannyonhwa landscapes, embroideries, picture albums and postage stamps introducing old cities and noted mountains of Korea, famous paintings, several hundred kinds of souvenirs.
					
					 The goods also include insam (ginseng) products including the famous Koryo insam and Kaesong Koryo insam tea and Koryo medicines efficacious for medical cure.
					
					 The restaurant serves such national foods as Pyongyang cold noodle, boiled rice accompanied by bean paste soup and kimchi and varied dishes to the customers.
					
					 According to Jong Sin, manager of the showrooms, lots of foreigners have visited the showrooms this year and said as one that they were happy to visit the showrooms deep in the odor of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Talented Magician, Ri Il Jin
articles.content:
Talented Magician, Ri Il Jin
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- Among the acrobatic pieces produced by the Pyongyang Circus recently there is the functional magic "Bumper Catfish."
					 The performer of the masterly and skillful functional magic piece is Ri Il Jin, a 22-year-old budding magician, who fishes a hundred big catfish in five minutes.
					
					 He was a table tennis player at the Kigwancha Sports Group before the state discovered his talent and took him to the Pyongyang Acrobatics School.
					
					 While at school he was absorbed in training including hand tricks and rhythmic skill and he surprised the audience when he appeared on the stage with the functional magic "Parrot Feat" and "Clock Feat".
					
					 "Bumper Catfish" was the first stage work after his graduation.
					
					 His depictive style is a peculiar one in which he boldly shook off the old style.
					
					 He takes the catfish with his swift hand trick out of thin air where the audience never expect it.
					
					Not satisfied with his success, he is making tireless efforts to produce more new and unique functional magic pieces.

articles.title: U. S. Bellicose Forces Accused of Sparking New Nuclear Arms Race
articles.content:
U. S. Bellicose Forces Accused of Sparking New Nuclear Arms Race
Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the U.S. bellicose forces including the commander of the U.S. strategic command asserted that it should speed up the modernization of nuclear weapons and shape a comprehensive policy of nuclear weapons in a bid to hold a military edge internationally.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in a signed commentary terms his remarks a dangerous prelude to a new nuclear arms race.
					
					 The commentary cites facts to prove that the U.S. is talking about the "nuclear disarmament" but, in actuality, is doggedly opposed to it and seeking the modernization of nuclear weapons, as a matter of fact.
					
					It is an invariable policy and the strategic intention of the U.S. imperialists to contain other powers with the nuclear edge and threaten and blackmail and control the anti-imperialist independent countries in a bid to realize their ambition to dominate the world, says the commentary, and goes on:
					
					 These facts convince other countries that only when they have strong military deterrent, can they protect their rights to exist from the U.S. and defend state security and strategic interests.
					
					The U.S. imperialists' moves for the modernization of nuclear weapons compel the Korean people to heighten their revolutionary vigilance and the DPRK to build powerful deterrent to cope with them. The U.S. reckless acts spark and escalate the new nuclear arms race and it is bringing the danger of a nuclear showdown and this will not do it good either.
					
					 The U.S. can never dominate the world with nuclear weapons.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Talk about "Dialogue" Termed Hypocritical
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Talk about "Dialogue" Termed Hypocritical
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- Whenever an opportunity presents itself Lee Myung Bak and his high-ranking officials assert that they would "settle" all issues of the inter-Korean relations "through dialogue on the basis of co-existence and co-prosperity" and they are "ready for dialogue."
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary in this regard.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 What they are talking about "dialogue" does not match with the frantic racket of confrontation with the DPRK they have staged so far because this is, in essence, nothing but a renewed despicable racket of confrontation and a crafty move to bedevil the inter-Korean relations under the signboard of "dialogue."
					
					If the south Korean authorities truly wish to have inter-Korean dialogue, they should clarify their stand to respect the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and their will to implement them before uttering any word about it. This would be a proper order of their behavior. 
					
					It is not hard to guess what sort of "dialogue" the Lee group is touting and what it is seeking through it. The Lee group has only a wild ambition to stand in confrontation with the DPRK to the last.
					
					 The Lee group has pushed the inter-Korean relations to the present phase of total severance, seized with the extremely wild ambition for confrontation with fellow countrymen. It has been driven into the worst crisis by the strong protest and denunciation from the public at home and abroad.
					
					The spate of nonsensical talk about "dialogue" made by the group is nothing but a revelation of its criminal intention to mislead the public opinion at home and abroad and misuse the inter-Korean dialogue for achieving their sinister political aim.
					
					 The Lee group can never be a dialogue partner of the DPRK as long as it regards its dialogue partner as "the principal enemy," opposed to the above-said declarations, and pursues its criminal scenario to do harm to it in collusion with foreign forces.
					
					 Hypocritical is the "dialogue" much publicized by those who seek confrontation with daggers hidden behind their belts. No one would lend an ear to such crafty and capricious jargon about "dialogue" no matter how often it may let loose. 
					
					 It is a pipedream and foolhardy act of precipitating self-destruction for the group to seek a way out in persistently standing in confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to face up to the trend of the times and stop their rash acts. They had better cease at once to trumpet about "dialogue" and make an apology to the whole nation for the acts of treachery they have committed by bedeviling the inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: Career of "Government" Condemned in S. Korea
articles.content:
Career of "Government" Condemned in S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- MBC of south Korea on Dec. 19 bitterly attacked the puppet government's doings.
					 MBC said that the south Korean people's hope on traitor Lee Myung Bak totally faded away in one year since he took office.
					
					 During the days the economy went bankrupt and the terrible sweeping roundup brought uneasiness about future to the masses of people leading a hard life, it deplored.
					
					 The population's estimation about the one year performance of the present "government" is frigid, it said, adding that according to an opinion poll, most of the respondents gave no to Lee's administration.
					
					 MBC held that Lee should deeply reflect on his wrongs, accepting the estimation results of his past doings.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Observed
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Observed
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- A Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition was held in France and a lecture and a photo show in Guinea between Dec. 12 and 14 on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 On display in the venue of the exhibition were photos showing the undying feats of the three generals of Mt. Paektu and their personality as the great persons, books and pictures introducing Songun Korea and handicrafts associated with wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 The mayor of a city in France in his speech at the opening ceremony of the exhibition hoped that the exhibition would make great contribution to deepening the understanding between the peoples of the two countries and boosting the friendly relations.
					
					 The manager of a farm in Guinea stressed in the lecture titled "Supreme commander's military inspection" that Kim Jong Il has steadily shown warm paternal love for the servicepersons, always finding himself among them.
					
					It is not without reason that all servicepersons of the KPA are filled with the will to remain loyal to Kim Jong Il's idea and leadership and unhesitatingly dedicate their lives for him, the speaker said.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno la Fabrica de Ceramica de Huichon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno la Fabrica de Ceramica de Huichon
Pyongyang, 22 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del  Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Fabrica de Ceramica de Huichon.
					Sobre todo, se entero detalladamente de la situacion de aplicacion de nuevas tecnicas y de produccion recorriendo la planta.
					
					Al ver las porcelanas de todo tipo producidas en la planta, se mostro muy satisfecho de que dentro de un ano nada mas, se incremento subitamente la produccion de porcelanas y se mejoro decisivamente su calidad.
					
					Evaluo altamente los exitos laborales de los funcionarios, tecnicos y obreros de la fabrica destacando que ellos hicieron muchas cosas para consolidar la base material y tecnica de su centro de trabajo.
					
					 Senalo que los orgullosos exitos alcanzados en esta fabrica devienen valioso resultado del espiritu revolucionario de autoconfianza y lucha tenaz y comprueban con hechos que las posibilidades de reserva del aumento productivo residen en el progreso cientifico y tecnico.
					
					Si se esfuerzan tenazmente poniendo en el primer lugar el desarrollo cientifico-tecnico al igual que los obreros de aqui, se puede lograr un desarrollo vertiginoso en la produccion realizando exitosamente la jucheanizacion, la modernizacion y la cientifizacion de la economia nacional, apunto y enfatizo que todos los dominios y unidades deben establecer estrictamente un sistema productivo basado en la ciencia y tecnica avanzadas.
					
					Al enumerar las tareas que tiene esta fabrica, dijo que ella debe producir mayor cantidad de las utiles y elegantes porcelanas de diversas formas para suministrarlas suficientemente a los habitantes.
					
					Recalco que para incrementar incesantemente la produccion, es preciso seguir impulsando energicamente la fundamentacion cientifica del proceso productivo y, al mismo tiempo, mejorar constantemente el nivel tecnico y la calificacion de los obreros y tecnicos y aplicar ampliamente las tecnicas avanzadas.
					
					 Es muy grande la potencialidad de nuestra economia nacional independiente construida solidamente, senalo y enfatizo que a fin de explotar al maximo esta colosal potencialidad productiva, se debe elevar el nivel de guia de los funcionarios directivos del dominio economico, en particular, el papel de los cientificos y tecnicos.
					
					Encomendo que los funcionarios y trabajadores de la fabrica deben lograr un gran auge en la produccion para hacer gran aporte a la mejora de la vida del pueblo.
					
					 Aprecio altamente los meritos de los habitantes de la provincia de Jagang subrayando que estos creadores del espiritu de Kanggye lograron este ano tambien esplendidos exitos en pleno acato a la consigna del partido: "!Hagamos brillar este ano del 60° aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica como un ano de cambios historicos que se registre indeleble en los anales de la Patria!"
					
					 Asevero que en el territorio de Jagang, convertido en el paraiso socialista, ya comenzo a verse en realidad el majestuoso aspecto de la gran potencia prospera y destaco que este excepcional prodigio deviene resultado brillante de las inagotables fuerzas espirituales del pueblo coreano capaz de remover hasta las grandes montanas si lo desea el partido.
					
					 Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los militantes del partido y trabajadores de la provincia de Jagang cumpliran excelentemente el papel de vanguardistas y ejecutores en todos los frentes de la construccion socialista con aquel espiritu e impetu, con que superaron triunfalmente las dificiles coyunturas de la revolucion dando pruebas del espiritu revolucionario de lucha tenaz.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Jagang, Pak To Chun, el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Ju Kyu Chang y Ri Je Gang, los generales de ejercito del EPC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores de la familia de Zhan Weihua
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores de la familia de Zhan Weihua
Pyongyang, 22 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del aniversario 17 del nombramiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, le hizo llegar el dia 22 un cesto de flores la familia del chino martir revolucionario antijapones Zhan Weihua.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena carrera armamentista proveniente de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena carrera armamentista proveniente de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 22 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Hace poco, el jefe de la Comandancia Estrategica y otros belicistas norteamericanos dijeron que Estados Unidos debe tomar la supremacia en la arena internacional al acelerar la modernizacion de armas nucleares y elaborar una politica comprensiva sobre este artefacto.
					Tal disparate de los belicistas yanquis deviene el preludio de la nueva y aventurera carrera armamentista nuclear. 
					
					Senala asi el rotativo Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual publicado este lunes y prosigue:
					
					Hay de sobra los datos corroborando que EE.UU. persigue la modernizacion del arma nuclear rehusando obstinadamente el "desarme nuclear" aunque habla mucho de este tema.
					
					Para la implementacion de su invariable politica y meta estrategica: la toma de hegemonia mundial, los imperialistas norteamericanos quieren mantener a raya a otras potencias y amenazar, chantajear y reprimir a los paises independientes antiimperialistas a base de su superioridad nuclear.
					
					Esta situacion hace a otros paises convencerse de que deben contar con fuerte disuasivo militar para defender el derecho a la vida, la seguridad y los intereses estrategicos nacionales frente a EE.UU.
					
					La modernizacion del arma nuclear por EE.UU. redobla la vigilancia revolucionaria del pueblo coreano y estimula a la RPDC a la preparacion del poderoso disuasivo para hacer frente a esta maniobra norteamericana.
					
					Las imprudentes acciones de EE.UU., que fomentan la nueva carrera armamentista nuclear, sirven de mecha del enfrentamiento nuclear, que no le convendria ni a si mismo.
					
					EE.UU. no podra dominar jamas el mundo con ese armamento de destruccion masiva.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela enganoso "dialogo" de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela enganoso "dialogo" de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 22 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Lee Myung Bak y sus acolitos dicen dia por dia que "solucionaran todos los problemas intercoreanos por medio del dialogo sobre la base de la convivencia y coprosperidad" y "estan listos a dialogar".
					Tales palabras no convienen a sus freneticos alborotos de enfrentamiento con la RPDC que perpetraron hasta ahora.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este lunes y continua:
					
					Si las autoridades surcoreanas desean de veras el dialogo Norte-Sur, deben esclarecer su posicion de respeto a la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y su voluntad de ejecutarlas antes de hablarlo.
					
					Es evidente la intencion de la banda de Lee concerniente al "dialogo". Ella  persigue solo la ambicion de enfrentarse hasta el final con la RPDC.
					
					Presa de ambicion de enfrentamiento fratricida, la horda de Lee llevo a la ruptura total las relaciones intercoreanas, con lo cual se encuentra en la peor crisis siendo un objeto de la poderosa protesta y condenacion de la opinion publica interna y externa.
					
					El "dialogo" de que habla Lee no pasa de ser intento criminal para inducir en error la opinion publica interna y externa y utilizar el dialogo Norte-Sur a su proposito politico malsano.
					
					Mientras que la banda de Lee niega las declaraciones arriba mencionadas, califica su contraparte del dialogo del “enemigo principal” y prosigue la ambicion de agredir a la RPDC en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras, nunca puede ser la contraparte del dialogo con la RPDC.
					
					La banda de Lee intenta buscar su salida desde el enfrentamiento con la RPDC. Pero, es la vana ilusion y la locura que acelera su autodestruccion.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben actuar con prudencia dandose clara cuenta de la corriente de la situacion, abstenerse de su enganoso "dialogo" y pedir perdon ante toda la nacion coreana por sus crimenes antinacionales de haber llevado al fracaso las relaciones intercoreanas.
